data.name: Regional
data.description: The activity scope is a supranational region

data.name: Multi-national
data.description: The activity scope covers multiple countries, that don't constitute a region

data.name: National
data.description: The activity scope covers one country

data.name: Sub-national: Multi-first-level administrative areas
data.description: The activity scope covers more than one first-level subnational administrative areas (e.g. counties, provinces, states)

data.name: Sub-national: Single first-level administrative area
data.description: The activity scope covers one first-level subnational administrative area (e.g. country, province, state)

data.name: Sub-national: Single second-level administrative area
data.description: The activity scope covers one second-level subnational administrative area (e.g. municipality or district)

data.name: Single location
data.description: The activity scope covers one single location (e.g. town, village, farm)
